name: Atul Kochhul Soft Shell Crab
recipeInstructions: 1. Put into a mixing bowl: 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp ground coriander, 1 tsp mango powder, 1/2 tsp red chilli powder, 2 tbsp mustard oil, the juice of 1/2 lime, salt, 3/4 tbsp cornflour, 3/4 tbsp rice flour. Mix well. If the paste is too thick add a little more oil to form a gluey paste.
2. Coat the crabs with the past by holding the crab in one hand, and massaging in the mixture with the other.
4. Serve with a light green salad.
